https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/MV4oKAa9tGL3Et05TTsf75flug.jpg Battling insomnia and undiagnosed PTSD, a war veteran works nights as a projectionist at a decrepit theater. While struggling to adapt to civilian life, he soon finds himself tangled in an inescapable web of seduction, addiction, and violence. An Act of War
